sentences.en: According to " motif we can divide negotiations the object and the perspective - oriented. "
sentences.cn: 根据这三个 纬度 我们将同伴协商行为划分成了几种类型.

sentences.en: Completing the war motif, sandbags surround the outdoor seating area.
sentences.cn: 完全战争的主题, 沙袋包环绕室外的座位区.

sentences.en: Hanging off the bed room Zhang different, are fashioned Motif bed.
sentences.cn: 客房内的床挂落张张不同, 均是老式花片床.

sentences.en: He then stencilled the ceiling with a moon and stars motif.
sentences.cn: 他随后用模版在天花板上印上了月亮和繁星图案。

sentences.en: In the bush a motif bird had built IT nest.
sentences.cn: 一只鸟母亲在灌木上筑了唯一巢.

sentences.en: Some echo with each other to highlight the motif.
sentences.cn: 一些人物相互呼应,共同突出主题.

sentences.en: TDAG 51 protein is rich in PQ ( praline - glutamine ) motif at the C terminal.
sentences.cn: TDAG51是PQR ( proline-glutamine-rich ) 蛋白,在其C - 端富含PQ即脯氨酸和谷氨酰胺.

sentences.en: The fictions with family motif in modern have uniform narrative form.
sentences.cn: 现代文学以家族为母题创作的小说拥有共性的叙事形式.

sentences.en: The jacket has a rose motif on the collar.
sentences.cn: 这件夹克衫领子上有一朵玫瑰花的图案.

sentences.en: The motif of these volumes is that 'solitude is the richness of the soul, loneliness is its poverty.'
sentences.cn: 这几卷的主题是“孤独是灵魂的财富，寂寞是灵魂的贫瘠”。

sentences.en: The motif of these volumes is that "solitude is the richness of the soul, loneliness is its poverty."
sentences.cn: 这几卷的主题是“孤独是灵魂的财富，寂寞是灵魂的贫瘠”。

sentences.en: The survey too searched a shift in among stay - at - habitat motif.
sentences.cn: 此外,检查呈现全职母亲的倾向也有所转变.

sentences.en: The theme of creation is a recurrent motif in Celtic mythology.
sentences.cn: 天地万物的创造是凯尔特神话中反复出现的主题。

sentences.en: This motif is concealed for a month or two.
sentences.cn: 他这个念头在头两个月还潜而不露.

sentences.en: This opera contains a love motif.
sentences.cn: 这出歌剧有个爱情主题.

trans.tran_cn: （文艺作品等的）主题，（音乐的）乐旨，动机，基本图案
trans.tran_en: an idea, subject, or image that is regularly repeated and developed in a book, film, work of art etc
